channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Chappell Roan Is The New Fortnite Festival Icon And The Skins Look Incredible
item.description: Chappell Roan skins are finally coming to Fortnite and they look fantastic.

item.title: 3 Simple Ways To Expand Your Capacity For Joy, By A Psychologist
item.description: You cannot bully your nervous system into feeling joy. Here's how you can try creating the conditions for it instead.

item.title: Beneath An Anne Boleyn Portrait, A Hidden Rebuttal To Rumors Of A Sixth Finger

item.title: New ‘Project Vault’ critical minerals stockpile is ‘first step of many’ needed for U.S. to break China’s supply-chain chokehold
item.description: The new stockpile plans are compared the the 50-year-old Strategic Petroleum Reserve, created in response to the 1973 Arab oil embargo.

item.title: Fed's Miran maintains call for aggressive interest rate cuts this year
item.description: Federal Reserve Governor Stephen Miran is calling for aggressive interest rate cuts exceeding one percentage point after dissenting in the latest FOMC...

item.title: Bob Iger left Disney’s CEO chair just before Covid exploded. Will his second exit be followed by a plot twist?

item.title: Moltbook is scary—but not for the reasons so many headlines said
item.description: It is people's devil-may-care attitude to the risk of AI agents that ought to really frighten us

item.title: ChatGPT Down: OpenAI Admits Outage Means It’s ‘Experiencing Issues’
item.description: The issue began at around 3 p.m. Eastern on Tuesday, Feb. 3. Here’s the latest.

item.title: Disney’s new CEO Josh D’Amaro stands to make $45 million but he’ll also get something priceless—a ‘clean break’ with Bob Iger
item.description: Disney’s new CEO is getting something that could be a major factor in his success: clarity about who's in charge.

item.title: China moves to ban feature commonly seen on Tesla vehicles over fear of trapped passengers
item.description: China bans electronic door handles starting 2027, requiring mechanical releases after safety incidents left passengers trapped inside vehicles.

item.title: Energy giant bets big on US, says its electricity market 'hottest' in the world

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
